title: Show Generated File Disclaimer
description: When enabled, a disclaimer showing the fact that the file was generated automatically and should not be changed manually will appear in all style styles

title: Base Path
description: Root path used as the base for all resource folders (e.g., colors, typography) (start wirh .).

title: Colors Path
description: Relative path from the base path to the colors folder (start with /).

title: Create Unified Color File
description: When enabled, all color tokens will be combined into a single file instead of creating separate files for each color group

title: Unified Color Class Name
description: Name of the unified color class (will be validated and formatted according to Dart naming rules). File name will be generated automatically from the class name. Only used when 'Create Unified Color File' is enabled

title: Use Color Entity Suffix
description: When enabled, color field names will have a suffix added to distinguish them as color entities

title: Color Entity Suffix
description: Suffix to be added to color field names (will be validated and formatted according to Dart naming rules). Only used when 'Use Color Entity Suffix' is enabled

title: Typography Path
description: Relative path from the base path to the typography folder (start with /).

title: Typography Path
description: Relative path from the base path to the shadows folder (start with /).
